title: Artillery

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Fire an artillery shell at a player's house, dealing an Unstoppable Rampage attack.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your kills appear to be from a Mortar (904).
- You have the same number of artillery shells as you did mortar shells when converted. If you killed a Townie, regain however many shells you would've had was the player not a Townie. If this spawned naturally, you have 3 shots.
- You may not shoot people 1 to 3 spots away from you on the player list. Dead players don't count.
- If 7 or less players are alive, the above attribute no longer applies. Revivals will not reinstate this restriction.
- If either of your target's neighbors stays home, they will be affected by the Rampage from the shrapnel.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate those you wish to not convert, or those who will not join you.

desc:
Post 4668
*Clearly the superior option. Why wouldn't you want to be able to hit farther away?*
